basics.name: Alexandra Chen
basics.summary: Passionate Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Committed to writing clean code, mentoring junior developers, and driving technical innovation.

work.name: TechFlow Inc.
work.description: Led development of microservices architecture serving 2M+ users daily. Built React-based dashboard increasing user engagement by 40%. Mentored 4 junior developers and established code review best practices. Technologies: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes.

work.name: StartupCore
work.description: Developed MVP for B2B SaaS platform from ground up, resulting in $2M Series A funding. Implemented real-time chat system and payment processing. Reduced API response times by 60% through optimization. Technologies: Vue.js, Python, MongoDB, Redis, Stripe API.

work.name: Digital Solutions Ltd
work.description: Built responsive e-commerce platforms for 15+ clients generating $5M+ in revenue. Integrated third-party APIs including payment gateways and shipping providers. Collaborated with UX/UI designers to deliver pixel-perfect implementations. Technologies: Angular, .NET Core, SQL Server, Azure.

work.name: CodeCraft Agency
work.description: Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins for small businesses. Fixed bugs and implemented new features for existing web applications. Participated in daily standups and sprint planning meetings. Technologies: PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, WordPress, jQuery.

projects.name: CloudSync Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard for cloud infrastructure monitoring

projects.name: AI Code Reviewer
projects.description: Machine learning tool for automated code quality analysis

awards.title: Employee of the Year 2023
awards.summary: Recognized for outstanding technical leadership and mentorship

awards.title: Best Innovation Award
awards.summary: Led development of breakthrough real-time collaboration feature

volunteer.summary: Develop web applications for non-profit organizations. Built donation platform for local animal shelter.
